testimonial2.text: Ag√™ncia Douro made all the difference in the sale of my home. The sale happened super fast. V√¢nia Fernandes, owner of the Agency, super friendly and competent, was always ready to answer my questions. I always recommend.

testimonial3.text: Great differentiated service from all the real estate agencies I knew in Porto. Ethics, commitment, getting to know the company, for me it was a gift from heaven. Congratulations Ag√™ncia Douro. Congratulations entrepreneur V√¢nia Fernandes!

SobreNos.title: About Us
SobreNos.subtitle: Luxury Real Estate Specialists in Portugal
SobreNos.description1: At Ag√™ncia Douro, our mission is to turn dreams into reality, always with an unwavering commitment to transparency and responsibility. Our team consists of highly qualified professionals, ready to help you realize the dream of your life.
SobreNos.description2: Operating in the national and international market, Ag√™ncia Douro is recognized for its transparency, responsibility and commitment to providing peace of mind in every transaction. Whether for own housing or investment, we offer complete support to ensure your business is safe and effective.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We believe in excellence as a standard, transparency as the basis of trust and integrity as a non-negotiable principle.

dedication.title: Dedication
dedication.description: We value personalized and dedicated service, recognizing that each client has unique needs.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Innovation and adaptation to market needs are pillars of our culture, allowing us to always offer the best possible service.

legalConsulting.title: Legal Consulting
legalConsulting.description: We ensure that all real estate transactions are carried out safely and in accordance with current legislation.

mortgageConsulting.title: Mortgage Consulting
mortgageConsulting.description: We help you find the best financing options, suited to your needs and financial profile.

realEstatePromotion.title: Real Estate Promotion
realEstatePromotion.description: We develop tailored marketing strategies to maximise your property's visibility and value in the market.

projectManagement.title: Real Estate Project Management
projectManagement.description: We oversee and coordinate every phase of your real estate project, from planning through to final delivery.

realEstateInvestments.title: Real Estate Investments
realEstateInvestments.description: We identify the best real estate investment opportunities through rigorous market analysis and optimised returns.

goldenVisa.title: Golden Visa
goldenVisa.description: We guide international investors through the entire Golden Visa process via real estate investment in Portugal.

mortgagePartners.title: Mortgage Partners
mortgagePartners.description: We work with a trusted network of banking partners to secure the best financing conditions for you.

SobreNos.teamDescription: Our team consists of highly qualified and experienced professionals, dedicated to providing the best service and turning your dreams into reality.

Podcast.title: Podcast Norte Imobili√°rio e Business
Podcast.subtitle: Conversations about the Luxury Real Estate Market in Portugal
Podcast.description: A podcast dedicated to discussing trends, challenges and opportunities in Portugal's luxury real estate market, with the participation of experts and professionals in the sector. The Podcast Norte Imobili√°rio e Business offers practical insights and inspiring content for investors, brokers and those interested in real estate and business, being a reliable source of information about the Portuguese sector.
Podcast.heroIntro: Conversations about the real estate market in Northern Portugal ‚Äî real experience, on-the-ground decisions and direct contact with investors, business owners and sector professionals.
Podcast.aboutIntro: Norte Imobili√°rio & Business is a space for conversation about the real estate market in Northern Portugal, built on real experience, on-the-ground decisions and direct contact with investors, business owners and sector professionals.
Podcast.aboutOrigin: Here we talk about what matters: market, investment, development, opportunities and risks. With clarity, direct language and a focus on those who need to decide better ‚Äî not on selling narratives.
Podcast.aboutIntention: Each episode is a conversation at the table. One topic at a time, the time needed to go deeper and participants who add vision, experience and relevant content.
Podcast.aboutPresentation: This podcast exists for those who want to understand the market better, follow trends and, when it makes sense, sit at the table to contribute their perspective.
Podcast.guestsDescription: Episodes feature specialists and professionals from the sector: lawyers, mortgage consultants, investors and other players in real estate and business. They bring practical experience, real cases and perspectives that help understand what is happening in Northern Portugal.
Podcast.sponsorText: Our sponsor supports quality conversations about real estate and business in Northern Portugal.
Podcast.whyListenSubtitle: Content designed for those who want to stay on top of the market and make informed decisions.

whyListenCards.title: In-depth conversations
whyListenCards.subtext: Time to explore each topic with clarity and without rush.

whyListenCards.title: Market trends
whyListenCards.subtext: Practical analysis of what is happening in Northern Portugal.

whyListenCards.title: Focus on the territory
whyListenCards.subtext: Knowledge from those who have been on the ground for years.

whyListenCards.title: Diverse voices
whyListenCards.subtext: Lawyers, consultants, investors and sector players.

whyListenCards.title: Useful information
whyListenCards.subtext: Content that helps with buy, sell or invest decisions.

whyListenCards.title: Practical topics
whyListenCards.subtext: Episodes that add value to your day-to-day.

Podcast.institutionalTitle: An institutional asset of Ag√™ncia Douro
Podcast.institutionalBody: The podcast is not a campaign. It is an institutional asset of Ag√™ncia Douro. It stems from the team's real experience in Northern Portugal's real estate market and reflects the firm's commitment to sharing knowledge, leading the conversation and serving those who invest, buy or sell with discernment.
Podcast.ctaFinalTitle: This space is for those who have something to say.
Podcast.ctaFinalDescription: If it makes sense to sit at the table and share your perspective, this is the channel to submit your podcast participation proposal. We select topics, stories and guests that elevate the conversation.
Podcast.testimonialsSubtitle: Discover why professionals across Portugal tune into the Norte Imobili√°rio & Business Podcast for industry insights.

testimonialsList.name: Joana S.
testimonialsList.text: An essential podcast for anyone who wants to keep up with real estate trends. High-quality content and top guests.

testimonialsList.name: Miguel R.
testimonialsList.text: The conversations bring perspectives I don't find elsewhere. I recommend it to any professional in the sector.

testimonialsList.name: Carla M.
testimonialsList.text: I listen to every episode. The calibre of guests and topics reflects what really matters in the market.

marketTrends.title: Market Trends

investmentTips.title: Investment Tips
investmentTips.description: Practical advice on how to invest in luxury properties, from choosing the location to appreciation strategies.

internationalVision.title: International Vision
internationalVision.description: Perspectives on foreign investors in Portugal and comparisons with other international markets.

Podcast.episodesDescription: Check out our most watched episodes and stay up to date with the conversations that are transforming the luxury real estate market.

apresentadora.label: Presentation
apresentadora.paragraph1: V√¢nia Fernandes works in the real estate market in Northern Portugal with a focus on decision-making, strategy and market reading. With over 15 years of experience in residential and commercial property, she has built her path on the ground, following cycles, investors, business owners and highly complex operations.
apresentadora.paragraph2: On the podcast, she leads the conversation ‚Äî she questions, deepens and brings context to topics that directly influence those who buy, sell, invest or develop real estate projects.
apresentadora.paragraph3: Her approach is clear: less talk, more substance. The aim is to create conversations that inform better and raise the quality of decisions in real estate.
apresentadora.quote: We want those who listen to have more context, more judgement and more confidence in the decisions they make.
apresentadora.imageAlt: V√¢nia Fernandes - Real Estate Consultant & Host

diretorProducao.label: Production Director
diretorProducao.name: Production Director
diretorProducao.paragraph1: With over 10 years of experience in audiovisual production and digital communication, he is responsible for the entire creative and technical direction of the podcast. From pre-production to post-production, he ensures that every episode meets the quality standard the project demands.
diretorProducao.paragraph2: His work goes beyond sound and image capture ‚Äî it involves topic research, content preparation, guest coordination and building a narrative that makes each conversation relevant and engaging for listeners.
diretorProducao.paragraph3: He believes a great podcast is born from the combination of valuable content and flawless technical execution. Every detail matters: from framing to final editing, everything is designed to deliver the best experience to the listener.
diretorProducao.quote: Our goal is for every episode to be a reference ‚Äî in content and in production quality.

Podcast.galleryDescription: Recorded in a professional studio in the heart of Porto, we guarantee maximum audio and video quality in every episode. An environment designed for inspiring and productive conversations.
Podcast.whereToFindUsDescription: Follow us on the main streaming platforms so you never miss an episode. Available wherever you are.
